snippet: The inmate, convicted of rape and murder, gasped and struggled, taking 15 minutes to die.
abstract: Dennis McGuire, Ohio inmate convicted of 1989 rape and murder of pregnant woman, struggles and gasps after lethal injection, taking 15 minutes to die at Southern Ohio Correctional Facility; episode reignites debate over lethal injection.
lead_paragraph: The inmate, convicted of rape and murder, gasped and struggled, taking 15 minutes to die.

headline.main: Ohio Execution Using Untested Drug Cocktail Renews the Debate Over Lethal Injections
headline.print_headline: Ohio Execution Using Untested Drug Cocktail Renews the Debate Over Lethal Injections
